thread.title: WATCH: Black Thugs Kidnap Special Needs Man, Torture Him While Screaming “F*** Trump”
thread.title_full: WATCH: Black Thugs Kidnap Special Needs Man, Torture Him While Screaming “F*** Trump”

author: Nickarama
title: WATCH: Black Thugs Kidnap Special Needs Man, Torture Him While Screaming “F*** Trump”
text:
10:12pm January 4, 2017   
A horrible story is breaking tonight of a young disabled man who was reportedly kidnapped, tied up and tortured while the action was broadcast live on Facebook. 
Four people are now in the custody of the Chicago Police Department. 
Here is a short clip of the broadcast. 
WARNING: STRONG LANGUAGE*** #BREAKING : Chicago Police tell FOX 32 that four people are in custody after man tied up, tortured on Facebook Live https://t.co/TY2rboK0JE pic.twitter.com/m0z6yRRtUI 
— FOX 32 News (@fox32news) January 4, 2017 
The police held a press conference a short while ago and said charges would be pending against the four. 
The victim, a white man, was repeatedly punched, kicked and cut by the attackers while tied up. 
They taunted him as they called him names, saying at one point, “F*** Donald Trump, F*** white people”. 
The victim is now at the hospital and police said because of his condition they were not yet sure of all the facts but would be questioning him further. 
They believed the attack to be credible. 
They would not comment on whether they believed the case to be a hate crime at this point. LIKE this article?
